attributes.action: acknowledge that the construction of an airport is crucial for St Helena Island's economic future, and to honour the British Government's promise to the people of St Helena that an airport would be constructed by removing the pause in negotiations over the St Helena airport project which brings it to a halt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In public support of the UK Parliament Early Day Motion (EDM 175 - Airport for the Island of St Helena) launched by Bob Russell, MP on 08.12.2008
